title: How to Make a Caramel Fudge Pudding Cake

steps.headline: Spray a 8 x 8-inch (20 cm) baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Place sauce ingredients into medium saucepan and heat to boiling.
Let sauce cool for a few minutes.
Pour milk into a microwave-safe glass measuring cup.
Add cake ingredients to a food processor bowl.
Pour brown sugar sauce over top.
Bake 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center of cake tests done.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream, a bit of half-and-half or milk poured over the top.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Spray a 8 x 8-inch (20 cm) baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.  Place sauce ingredients into medium saucepan and heat to boiling. Boil 5 minutes. Let sauce cool for a few minutes.  Pour milk into a microwave-safe glass measuring cup. Heat until warm. Add cake ingredients to a food processor bowl.  Process until batter is smooth.  Pour batter into prepared pan.  Pour brown sugar sauce over top.  Bake 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center of cake tests done.  Makes an 8-inch pudding cake.  Serve warm with vanilla ice cream, a bit of half-and-half or milk poured over the top.
